title: Advanced Guided Breathing For Maximum Focus
description:
💨 Get my NEW free 15-day breathwork course here: https://kitarowaga.kit.com/15-day-breathwork-course
🤝 Work with Me (Coaching): https://kitarowaga.com/academy
🎓 Get my in-depth Courses: https://kitarowaga.com/courses
🧡 If you want to support me, join my Guided Breathwork Library – a vast collection of all my guided sessions and weekly live guided sessions: https://kitarowaga.com/guided-breathwork-library

Don't do this breathing technique in water!


A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a Movement, Kung Fu, and breathwork practitioner and teacher. If you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel. 



My gear list:

🩳 👣 Clothing (I always wear the same few clothes)
Japanese Baggy Pants: https://amzn.to/3xU9LHn
Wildling Shoes (best barefoot shoes I know): https://bit.ly/3O6aMRH
H&M slim-fit T-Shirts (I always wear the same few shirts): https://amzn.to/3mNrVE7

🎥 Video
Camera: Sony a7S III: https://amzn.to/3vnSCUJ

Lenses: 
Sigma 24-70 mm F2.8: https://amzn.to/3Q5XPbs
Sony FE 35mm F1.4 GM: https://amzn.to/3zGnfqO
Sony 20mm F1.8 G: https://amzn.to/3oBNW9W

ND-Filter: https://amzn.to/3NXnna8
Mic: RØDE VideoMic Pro+: https://amzn.to/3HEBgrL

🎧 Music
I get all my music from Epidemic Sound
Epidemic Sound: https://bit.ly/3mMR4yX
channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/A_BTySUYvU8" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: This is an upgrade from original Wim Hof breathing. Not counting the breaths, but instead always 90 sec - starting with slow breathing and then gradually increase.. This is very good and important, because people have different pace, In Wim Hof exercises, people tend to keep the same rhythm as the recorded breather.. and that will not reach the same depths.. Thank you Kitaro  🙂
I ugly cried by the second round, I think that just tells me how much I needed the space to let thoughts & feelings that I've been holding down, come to the surface.
I practice with your videos most days and every time it improves my energy, focus and calm. Thank you, my friend, for your guidance.

So great to see this. I use your other WHM video for most mornings - it's nice to have this more advanced one for sure. You are a great instructor and your work within the breath community is invaluable. Keep up the great work!

I worked my way up from Wim Hof vids, to your basic vids, all the way up to this advanced which I have done for few months now. Very powerful. I use it in the mornings especially to slow my thinking down from the dream state. You always overdeliver Kitaro, so thank you my friend. Much love and Namaste, Dominic.
